Class.name: CSPX.Dashboard.ChartSeries
Class.Description: Defines a series for a Dashboard chart. This class is for internal use only.

Property.name: Property
Property.Description: Metric property providing the metric for this series. The Metric class is defined by the chart.

Property.name: Instance
Property.Description: (Optional) Metric instance name providing the data for this series.

Property.name: Label
Property.Description: Label displayed for this series; If not specified, <var>Property</var> is used.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: SVG Color used to display this series.

Property.name: Data
Property.Description: Holder for initial data for series.

Property.name: RangeUpper
Property.Description: Upper range value for this series. Only used if the chart has SharedScale set to false.

Property.name: RangeLower
Property.Description: Lower range value for this series. Only used if the chart has SharedScale set to false.

Property.name: ScaleFactor
Property.Description: Scale factor for this series. Only used if the chart has SharedScale set to false.
